ser_1.text: How are you feeling about your day so far?
What task or project are you currently working on, and how does it make you feel?
Is there anything on your mind right now that is affecting your mood?
How did your last interaction with a friend or family member make you feel today?
Can you describe a situation today that made you feel stressed?
Have you experienced any moments today that brought you joy or frustration?

ser_2.text: Tell me about something that happened this week that made you smile.
Describe a recent conversation that left you feeling positive or negative.
What is one thing you accomplished recently that you feel proud of?
Can you recall a moment from the past few days when you felt surprised?
Describe a challenge you faced this week and how you handled it.
Tell me about an interaction you had recently that was either pleasant or disappointing.

ser_3.text: What kind of activities do you enjoy doing in your free time?
Describe a place where you feel most comfortable and relaxed.
What are you looking forward to in the coming weeks?
Tell me about a hobby or interest that you find engaging.
What type of music or entertainment do you prefer and why?
Describe something you would like to learn or try in the future.
